content: इंड्रः, --ड्रं(इंड्वं) (Dual) Two round small plates used as coverings for the hands in taking the fire-pans from the fire; अथैनमिंड्राभ्यां परिगृह्णाति <ls>Śat. Br.</ls> (उखा याभ्यां गृह्यंते तौ इंड्रौ <ls>Karka</ls>).
